alert.note: Alert for Moses Lake Area; Spokane Area; Upper Columbia Basin; Washington Palouse (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 3:20AM PST until January 21 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Ice accumulations around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Spokane Valley, Grand Coulee, Davenport, La Crosse, Downtown Spokane, Creston, Ephrata, Oakesdale, Rosalia, Ritzville, Odessa, Airway Heights, Wilbur, Othello, Harrington, Pullman, Uniontown, Colfax, Hayden, Post Falls, Worley, Coulee City, Rockford, Tekoa, Quincy, Moses Lake, Cheney, Coeur d`Alene, and Fairfield. * WHEN...Until noon PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous.
info.instruction: Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Moses Lake Area; Spokane Area; Upper Columbia Basin; Washington Palouse
